2 #include <set>

4 tf_remapper_cpp::TfRemapperNode::TfRemapperNode() : privateNodeHandle("~")
5 {
6  this->oldTfTopic = this->privateNodeHandle.param<std::string>("old_tf_topic_name", "/tf_old");
7  this->remappedTfTopic = this->privateNodeHandle.param<std::string>("new_tf_topic_name", "/tf");
8 
9  if (this->privateNodeHandle.hasParam("static_tf"))
10  this->staticTf = this->privateNodeHandle.param<bool>("static_tf", false);
11  else
12  // Autodetect if the parameter is not set
13  this->staticTf = this->remappedTfTopic == "tf_static" || this->remappedTfTopic == "/tf_static";
14 
15  // Parse the 'mappings' parameter, which should be an array of dicts, e.g. [{"old": "b", "new": "d"}]
16  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue mappingsParam;
17  const bool hasMappingsParam = this->privateNodeHandle.getParam("mappings", mappingsParam);
18  if (!hasMappingsParam)
19  throw ros::InvalidParameterException("tf_remapper_cpp needs the private parameter 'mappings' set.");
20 
21  const bool bidirectional = this->privateNodeHandle.param<bool>("is_bidirectional", false);
22 
23  this->tfRemapper = TfRemapper(mappingsParam);
24  if (bidirectional)
25  this->reverseTfRemapper = TfRemapper(mappingsParam, true);
26 
27  if (!tfRemapper.getMappings().empty()) {
28  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Applying the following mappings" << (bidirectional ? " bidirectionally" : "") <<
29  " to incoming tf frame ids:");
30  for (TfRemapper::MappingsType::const_iterator it = tfRemapper.getMappings().begin();
31  it != tfRemapper.getMappings().end(); ++it) {
32  ROS_INFO_STREAM("* " << it->first << " " << (bidirectional && !it->second.empty() ? "<" : "") << "-> " <<
33  (it->second.empty() ? "DELETE" : it->second));
34  }
35  if (bidirectional) {
36  for (TfRemapper::MappingsType::const_iterator it = reverseTfRemapper.getMappings().begin();
37  it != reverseTfRemapper.getMappings().end(); ++it) {
38  if (it->second.empty())
39  ROS_INFO_STREAM("* DELETE <- " << it->first);
40  }
41  }
42  } else {
43  ROS_WARN("No mappings defined.");
44  }
45 
46  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Old TF topic: " << this->oldTfTopic);
47  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Remapped TF topic: " << this->remappedTfTopic);
48  if (this->staticTf)
49  ROS_INFO("Running in static TF mode (caching all TFs, latched publisher)");
50 
51  this->oldTfSubscriber = this->publicNodeHandle.subscribe(
52  this->oldTfTopic, 100, &TfRemapperNode::oldTfCallback, this);
53  this->remappedTfPublisher = this->publicNodeHandle.advertise<tf2_msgs::TFMessage>(
54  this->remappedTfTopic, 100, this->staticTf);
55 
56  if (bidirectional) {
57  this->remappedTfSubscriber = this->publicNodeHandle.subscribe(
58  this->remappedTfTopic, 100, &TfRemapperNode::remappedTfCallback, this);
59  this->oldTfPublisher = this->publicNodeHandle.advertise<tf2_msgs::TFMessage>(
60  this->oldTfTopic, 100, this->staticTf);
61  }
62 }
63 
64 void tf_remapper_cpp::TfRemapperNode::oldTfCallback(const ros::MessageEvent<tf2_msgs::TFMessage const>& event) {
65  // Prevent reacting to own messages from bidirectional mode
66  const std::string& callerid = event.getPublisherName();
67  if (callerid == ros::this_node::getName())
68  return;
69 
70  tf2_msgs::TFMessage message = this->tfRemapper.doRemapping(*event.getConstMessage());
71 
72  // Since static TF can come from many latched publishers, and we are only a single publisher, we must gather all
73  // the static TF messages in a cache and every time publish all of them.
74  if (this->staticTf) {
75  this->addToStaticTfCache(message, this->staticTfCache);
76  this->remappedTfPublisher.publish(this->staticTfCache);
77  } else {
78  this->remappedTfPublisher.publish(message);
79  }
80 }
81 
82 void tf_remapper_cpp::TfRemapperNode::remappedTfCallback(const ros::MessageEvent<tf2_msgs::TFMessage const>& event) {
83  // Prevent reacting to own messages from bidirectional mode
84  const std::string& callerid = event.getPublisherName();
85  if (callerid == ros::this_node::getName())
86  return;
87 
88  tf2_msgs::TFMessage message = this->reverseTfRemapper.doRemapping(*event.getConstMessage());
89 
90  // Since static TF can come from many latched publishers, and we are only a single publisher, we must gather all
91  // the static TF messages in a cache and every time publish all of them.
92  if (this->staticTf) {
93  this->addToStaticTfCache(message, this->reverseStaticTfCache);
94  this->oldTfPublisher.publish(this->reverseStaticTfCache);
95  } else {
96  this->oldTfPublisher.publish(message);
97  }
98 }
99 
100 void tf_remapper_cpp::TfRemapperNode::addToStaticTfCache(
101  const tf2_msgs::TFMessage& message, tf2_msgs::TFMessage& cache) const {
102  // We do an inefficient O(N^2) search here, but there should not be that many static TFs that it would matter
103  for (std::vector<geometry_msgs::TransformStamped>::const_iterator it = message.transforms.begin();
104  it != message.transforms.end(); ++it) {
105  bool found = false;
106  for (std::vector<geometry_msgs::TransformStamped>::iterator cacheIt = cache.transforms.begin();
107  cacheIt != cache.transforms.end(); ++cacheIt) {
108  if (it->child_frame_id == cacheIt->child_frame_id) {
109  found = true;
110  *cacheIt = *it;
111  break;
112  }
113  }
114  if (!found)
115  cache.transforms.push_back(*it);
116  }
117 }

119 int main(int argc, char * argv[])
120 {
121  ros::init(argc, argv, "tf_remapper");
122  tf_remapper_cpp::TfRemapperNode remapper;
123  ros::spin();
124  return 0;
125 }
